task.title: How to Protect Documents with a Password
task.shortdesc: In case of secret business documents or personal documents with private information, it makes sense to protect the contents of Word documents with a password. In this section, you will learn how to do it.

step.cmd: On the File tab, go to Info, and then Protect Dcocument.
A dropdown menu opens. Click on Encrypt with Password.
An Encrypt Document dialogue box opens for you to type your password. Then, hit Ok.
